description.ko: 햇빛에 그을린 사막의 거친 기하학적 구조부터 산맥의 부드럽고 복잡한 층에 이르기까지, 우리 행성의 다양한 지형적 질감을 몰입감 있게 시각적으로 탐구하여 지구의 촉각적 아름다움을 강조합니다.
description.en: An immersive visual study of the planet's diverse topographical textures, ranging from the rugged geometry of sun-baked deserts to the soft, intricate layers of mountain ranges, highlighting the tactile beauty of our world.

prompt: Hyper-realistic macro photography of Earth's surface textures, satellite perspective blending into tactile close-ups, deep fissures in parched clay, soft undulations of mossy forest floors, crystalline structures of arctic ice, rich earthy color palette, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, intricate organic details, TERRA-1 aesthetic.
